verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ׀ <S%H5329><s%> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician לִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> [Tliv-nei-for the sons קֹ֬רַח <S%H7141><s%> Ko-rach of Korah מִזְמֽוֹר׃ <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor. גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- Both בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei afflicted אָ֭דָם <S%H120><s%> 'A-dom man גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- Both בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- afflicted אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish; he יַ֝֗חַד <S%H3162><s%> Ya-chad, together עָשִׁ֥יר <S%H6223><s%> 'a-Shir rich וְאֶבְיֽוֹן׃ <S%H34><s%> ve-'ev-Yon. and poor

אַטֶּ֣ה <S%H5186><s%> 'at-Teh I will incline לְמָשָׁ֣ל <S%H4912><s%> le-ma-Shal to a parable אָזְנִ֑י <S%H241><s%> 'a-ze-Ni; mine ear אֶפְתַּ֥ח <S%H6605><s%> 'ef-Tach I will open בְּ֝כִנּ֗וֹר <S%H3658><s%> be-chin-Nor, upon the harp חִידָתִֽי׃ <S%H2420><s%> chi-da-Ti. my dark saying

לָ֣מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Lam-mah Why אִ֭ירָא <S%H3372><s%> 'I-ra Wherefore should I fear בִּ֣ימֵי <S%H3117><s%> Bi-mei in the days רָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> Ra'; of evil עֲוֹ֖ן <S%H5771><s%> 'a-Von [when] the iniquity עֲקֵבַ֣י <S%H6120><s%> 'a-ke-Vai of my heels יְסוּבֵּֽנִי׃ <S%H5437><s%> ye-su-Be-ni. shall compass

הַבֹּטְחִ֥ים <S%H982><s%> hab-bo-te-Chim They that trust עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- in חֵילָ֑ם <S%H2428><s%> chei-Lam; in their wealth וּבְרֹ֥ב <S%H7230><s%> u-ve-Ro themselves in the multitude עָ֝שְׁרָ֗ם <S%H6239><s%> 'a-she-Ram, of their riches יִתְהַלָּֽלוּ׃ <S%H1984><s%> yit-hal-La-lu. and boast

אָ֗ח <S%H251><s%> 'Ach, his brother לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- No פָדֹ֣ה <S%H6299><s%> fa-Doh by any means יִפְדֶּ֣ה <S%H6299><s%> yif-Deh redeem אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish; None [of them] can לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- Or יִתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> yit-Ten nor give לֵאלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> le-lo-Him to God כָּפְרֽוֹ׃ <S%H3724><s%> ka-fe-Ro. a ransom

וְ֭יֵקַר <S%H3365><s%> Ve-ye-kar [is] precious פִּדְי֥וֹן <S%H6306><s%> pid-Yon (For the redemption נַפְשָׁ֗ם <S%H5315><s%> naf-Sham, of their soul וְחָדַ֥ל <S%H2308><s%> ve-cha-Dal and it ceaseth לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam. forever

וִֽיחִי־ <S%H2421><s%> vi-chi- That he should still live ע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od on לָנֶ֑צַח <S%H5331><s%> la-Ne-tzach; for ever לֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יִרְאֶ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> yir-'Eh [and] not see הַשָּֽׁחַת׃ <S%H7845><s%> hash-Sha-chat. corruption

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for יִרְאֶ֨ה׀ <S%H7200><s%> yir-'Eh For he seeth חֲכָ֘מִ֤ים <S%H2450><s%> cha-Cha-Mim [that] wise men יָמ֗וּתוּ <S%H4191><s%> ya-Mu-tu, die יַ֤חַד <S%H3162><s%> Ya-chad likewise כְּסִ֣יל <S%H3684><s%> ke-Sil the fool וָבַ֣עַר <S%H1198><s%> va-Va-'ar and the brutish person יֹאבֵ֑דוּ <S%H6><s%> yo-Ve-du; perish וְעָזְב֖וּ <S%H5800><s%> ve-'a-ze-Vu and leave לַאֲחֵרִ֣ים <S%H312><s%> la-'a-che-Rim to others חֵילָֽם׃ <S%H2428><s%> chei-Lam. their wealth

קִרְבָּ֤ם <S%H7130><s%> kir-Bam Their inward בָּתֵּ֨ימוֹ׀ <S%H1004><s%> bat-Tei-mov thought [is that] their houses לְֽעוֹלָ֗ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam, [shall continue] for ever מִ֭שְׁכְּנֹתָם <S%H4908><s%> Mish-ke-no-tom [and] their dwelling לְדֹ֣ר <S%H1755><s%> le-Dor places to all וָדֹ֑ר <S%H1755><s%> va-Dor; generations קָֽרְא֥וּ <S%H7121><s%> ka-re-'U they call בִ֝שְׁמוֹתָ֗ם <S%H8034><s%> vish-mo-Tam, after their own names עֲלֵ֣י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei and אֲדָמֽוֹת׃ <S%H127><s%> a-da-Mot. [their] lands

וְאָדָ֣ם <S%H120><s%> ve-'a-Dam Nevertheless man בִּ֭יקָר <S%H3366><s%> Bi-kor [being] in honour בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> bal- will not יָלִ֑ין <S%H3885><s%> ya-Lin; abideth נִמְשַׁ֖ל <S%H4911><s%> nim-Shal not he is like כַּבְּהֵמ֣וֹת <S%H929><s%> kab-be-he-Mot the beasts נִדְמֽוּ׃ <S%H1820><s%> nid-Mu. [that] perish

זֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh This דַ֭רְכָּם <S%H1870><s%> Dar-kom This their way כֵּ֣סֶל <S%H3689><s%> Ke-sel [is] their folly לָ֑מוֹ la-mo; וְאַחֲרֵיהֶ֓ם׀ <S%H310><s%> ve-'a-cha-rei-Hem yet their posterity בְּפִיהֶ֖ם <S%H6310><s%> be-fi-Hem their sayings יִרְצ֣וּ <S%H7521><s%> yir-Tzu approve סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

כַּצֹּ֤אן׀ <S%H6629><s%> katz-Tzon Like sheep לִֽשְׁא֣וֹל <S%H7585><s%> lish-'ol in the grave שַׁתּוּ֮ <S%H8371><s%> shat-Tu they are laid מָ֤וֶת <S%H4194><s%> Ma-vet death יִ֫רְעֵ֥ם <S%H7462><s%> yir-'Em shall feed וַיִּרְדּ֘וּ <S%H7287><s%> vai-yir-Du shall have dominion בָ֤ם vam יְשָׁרִ֨ים׀ <S%H3477><s%> ye-sha-Rim on them and the upright לַבֹּ֗קֶר <S%H1242><s%> lab-Bo-ker, over them in the morning; וְצִירָם ve-tzi-ram כוְ֭צוּרָם <S%H6736><s%> Ve-tzu-rom beauty קלְבַלּ֥וֹת <S%H1086><s%> le-val-Lot shall consume שְׁא֗וֹל <S%H7585><s%> she-'ol, in the grave מִזְּבֻ֥ל <S%H2073><s%> miz-ze-Vul from their dwelling לֽוֹ׃ lo.

אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> 'ach- but אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, But God יִפְדֶּ֣ה <S%H6299><s%> yif-Deh will redeem נַ֭פְשִׁי <S%H5315><s%> Naf-shi my soul מִֽיַּד־ <S%H3027><s%> mi-yad- from the power שְׁא֑וֹל <S%H7585><s%> she-'ol; of the grave כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki for יִקָּחֵ֣נִי <S%H3947><s%> yik-ka-Che-ni for he shall receive סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. me Selah

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki when לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not בְ֭מוֹתוֹ <S%H4194><s%> ve-mo-to For when he dieth יִקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> yik-Kach he shall carry nothing away הַכֹּ֑ל <S%H3605><s%> hak-Kol; all manner לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- will not יֵרֵ֖ד <S%H3381><s%> ye-Red shall not descend אַחֲרָ֣יו <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rav after כְּבוֹדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3519><s%> ke-vo-Do. his glory
